instruction: Write a paragraph summarizing the main points discussed in the text.
output: The text discusses the relationship between COVID-19 disease, containment measures, and socio-economic factors. It highlights how the pandemic spread due to global interconnectedness and how wealth played a role in the spread of the infection. Policymakers faced a trade-off between public health and economic impact of containment measures. The authors aim to investigate the complex system of COVID-19 diffusion using network tools to detect communities of countries with similar reactions to the pandemic.
